task.name: interpolatemodel
task.shortdescription: Task for interpolating model column from a frequency averaged measurement set to a higher resolution measurement set.
task.description: Task for interpolating model column from a frequency averaged measurement set to a higher resolution measurement set.

param.name: visfrom
param.description: Name of measurement set from which the model column is interpolated.

param.name: visto
param.description: Name of measurement set to which the interpolated model is written

param.name: kind
param.description: Type of interpolation (Only linear allowed for now)
